column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I also got the Oatmeal Creme Pie and Hazelnut Brioche. Both were good
column2: nothing super special or out of the ordinary. The creme
column3: in the creme pie is not as sweet as I would've liked it to be. It tasted pretty fresh though. The Hazelnut Brioche is like a huge Ferrero Rocher
column4: literally. My first impression was: nutella! It was slightly less sweet than nutella
